name: Chatbox Shamus: From Sloth to Sleuth (Canceled)
blurb: A film noir-themed visual novel game, set in 1984, following amateur detective Bastion Crowley, who runs his agency from a college BBS.

rewards.reward: "All I've Got" Tier - Demonstrate your good intentions as a stark contrast to wealth. Backers who pledge at least a dollar get their name in the credits under "Modest Contributors" and will see all of my Backers-Only updates.

"A Modest Sum" Tier - Contribute more money to this little project than your average iOS app, and get your name in the credits as a backer under "Slightly Less Modest Contributors" as well as getting a digital copy of the soundtrack on whatever format it ends up being in. Oh, by the way, this and all other tiers also get the backers-only updates.

"Maybe a Bit More" Tier - Your name goes in the credits under "Slightly More Significant Contributors", you get a digital-download copy of the full game (DRM free) when it's done, and the soundtrack as well. (Note: $10 is pretty much what I hope to charge for the game, though it may be subject to change, given market trends and all.)

"Double Duty" Tier - Contributors who pledge twice as much as the game costs will get in the credits as "Very Significant Contributors" and will get the game, the soundtrack, and maybe I'll see about getting you some physical media for the game (also DRM free), in a jewelcase with a nice cover art or something.

"Pay Bastion's Rent For A Week" Tier - Contributors who pledge this much will be in the credits under "Contributors, Their Wallets Runneth Over" and will get all previous rewards, and I'll also see about getting you a physical copy of the game in a good box with some print copies of some of my working documents and other behind-the-scenes stuff. I will also place your name somewhere in the game text (at my discretion, though you may submit me any name you like as long as it sounds like an actual person's name).

"Awesome" Tier - For pledging this much, you get to be in the credits under the "Philanthropic Contributors" section, and will get all previous rewards, plus I will insert you into the game for a bit part with at least one spoken line (again, at my discretion). Note if you select this tier, I will need photographs of you; some artistic liberty may be taken to make you fit more readily into the period.

"More Than Bastion Makes In A Month" Tier - This tier places you in the credits under "Heavy Contributors" and gets you all previous rewards, plus you will be inserted into the game as a minor yet significant character (I will still be handling all the writing, but your name and likeness will be used) with spoken dialogue and some actual bearing on the case.
